verbs.description: Donald Trump , who [V: has] made tighter controls on immigration a mainstay of his campaign , has a new plan : an ideological test for anyone entering the U.S.
[ARG0: Donald Trump] , [R-ARG0: who] has [V: made] [ARG1: tighter controls on immigration a mainstay of his campaign] , has a new plan : an ideological test for anyone entering the U.S.
